thread.title: Punjab boys win again, girls lose
thread.title_full: Punjab boys win again, girls lose

author: tribuneindia.com
title: Punjab boys win again, girls lose
text:
Anil Datt
Ludhiana, October 4
Delhi and Tamil Nadu scripted huge wins in the boys’ section on the third day of the 66th Junior National Basketball Championship here today. Meanwhile, the Punjab boys continued their dominance with a 74-39 win over Madhya Pradesh on Saturday evening. Rahul scored 25 points, while Dilpreet scored 21 as the defending champions won their second match in a row. The Punjab girls, however, suffered their first defeat, going down 61-40 to Karnataka. Last year’s runners-up Delhi thrashed Andhra Pradesh 105-58, while Tamil Nadu beat Haryana 104-76 with Surya (21) top-scoring. In the girls’ section, Kerala, runners-up in the last edition, proved too good for Haryana, winning 75-30. The Chandigarh boys beat Bihar 65-38. Basketball Jr Nationals Results
Girls
TN bt Gujarat 65-29
Chandigarh bt Odisha 54-52
Kerala bt Haryana 75-30
Maharashtra bt WB 70-42
Saturday evening
Karnataka bt Punjab 61-40
Boys
TN bt Haryana 104-76
Delhi bt AP 105-58
Rajasthan bt
Maharashtra 94-50
Uttarakhand bt
Tripura 54-45
Chandigarh bt Bihar 65-38
Saturday evening
Punjab bt MP 74-39
